name: openblock-link
description: Porvide local hardware function to openblock

scripts.fetch: rimraf tools firmwares && node script/download-tools.js && node script/download-firmwares.js
scripts.start: rimraf ../.openblockData/link && export NVM_DIR="$HOME/Library/Application Support/Herd/config/nvm" && [ -s "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" ] && \. "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" && nvm use 16 && node test/start-server.js --log-level=info
scripts.start:debug: rimraf ../.openblockData/link && export NVM_DIR="$HOME/Library/Application Support/Herd/config/nvm" && [ -s "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" ] && \. "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" && nvm use 16 && node test/start-server.js --log-level=debug
scripts.build: rimraf build && mkdir -p build && cp -r src build/ && cp -r script build/ && cp -r test build/ && cp package.json build/ && cp -r node_modules build/ && cp simulador-openblock-link-real.js build/ && cp pico_connection_lib.py build/ && cp pico_bridge.py build/ && cp test-pico-final.js build/
scripts.build:start: cd build && export NVM_DIR="$HOME/Library/Application Support/Herd/config/nvm" && [ -s "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" ] && \. "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" && nvm use 16 && node test/start-server.js --log-level=info
scripts.test:multi-server: export NVM_DIR="$HOME/Library/Application Support/Herd/config/nvm" && [ -s "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" ] && \. "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" && nvm use 16 && node test/start-multi-server.js --log-level=info
